Description:
STUNNING VIEWS IN PRIME LOCATION
This apartment is absolutely stunning, with bay views and fully equipped with all amenities you could desire to enjoy a tranquil weekender or investment.
This property boats one spacious bedroom suite with double lounge area looking after the sparkling bay. The second living area is fully equipped with a kitchen, dining and provisions for a second bedroom space, ensuring the property can comfortably accommodate four.
Situated across the road from the family friendly Cowes foreshore bay beach, this property is easy living at its best! Stroll across the road and enjoy the children’s playground, local restaurants and bars, shopping precincts and of course the beach.
Additional facilities include an electrical awning covering the balcony with shade, split system, extra cabinetry in the kitchen and bathroom, garden hose on the balcony, and security doors.
This apartment is certainly a stand out on the third floor of the Waves complex, the building is fully equipped with lift facilities and car parking.
At this price, with water views you can’t go wrong, a perfect investment for you and the family.
Book an inspection today.
Insights: 5 other 1 bedroom unit in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
TEDDY BEAR COTTAGE
A great opportunity to enter the market with this cute cottage. Offering three bedrooms , one bathroom & two living areas, this property should not be missed.
Located approximately 800m to the beautiful Red Rocks Beach, a safe bay beach suitable for children and water sport activities like kayaing or SUP. This close to the beach but still far out of the hustle and bustle of Cowes Central to be a peaceful retreat.
Located on a 603m2 block of land with a secured large back yard, a blank canvas to add your own touches.
Don’t miss out. Call Jenni Kent 0428 566 643

Description:
FANTASTIC DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
Here is a rare opportunity to secure a sizable plot of land less than 250 metres from the beach with the potential to subdivide into 6 townhouse sites (STCA) all with potential bay views.
The 2331 sqm allotment is less than 4 kms from the centre of Cowes and an easy distance to all of Phillip Islands attractions. Services available to the block include mains water, sewerage, power and telephone.

Description:
WHEN LOCATION COUNTS!
This neat two bedroom home boasts lovely spacious living, two bedrooms and a central bathroom. With the added comfort of ceilings fans, split system, rear sunny courtyard and single lock up garage.
Only a short stroll to the famous Cowes foreshore beach, local shops and restaurants, you will leave the car at home and enjoy the delights of Phillip Island.
This home is the perfect entry level investment, permanent residence, or a lovely holiday home.
Inspection is a must!

Description:
Create Your Own Lifestyle
Located in one of Phillip Islands most thriving suburbs, Cowes, is a rare chance to secure this fantastic titled 576 sqm (approx) fenced allotment with a lovely rural aspect and potential for water glimpses from a second level.
The property has underground power, water, recycled water and sewerage available to the boundary and optic-fibre connections to the National Broadband Network. This is a perfect opportunity to enjoy the Island lifestyle by securing your very own vacant allotment in a family friendly area.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
CONVENIENCE, COMFORT & CLASS
A versatile design with quality features throughout, this contemporary two-level townhouse has it all, and so close to the beach!
Downstairs, the home boasts a large open plan living and dining area, kitchen with polished stone bench tops and spacious master bedroom with a lovely en-suite and walk in robe; perfect for the parents retreat.
Upstairs there are a further two sizeable bedrooms with a stylish central bathroom. Additionally, the property offers a great low maintenance court yard, single garage plus another open car space.
This modern townhouse offers comfort and class with exceptional suitability for young families, holiday makers and investors alike.
Simply a short stroll to central Cowes, local shops, restaurants, medical centres and Cowes Primary, this property won’t last long. Book an inspection today!

Description:
Centrally located
PROPERTY NOW UNDER OFFER
A classic family home, set back on 650sqm, centrally located in Cowes and walking distance to all the Cowes has to offer including North facing beautiful bay beach and shops. Full of character and perfect for either the family weekender or permanent residence.
The idyllic large four bedroom family home with space and privacy includes an extensive list of extra's, low maintenance garden, fully fenced, high ceilings, formal lounge & dining, central family bathroom.
Sit back and relax on the full length undercover front Verandah and enjoy the summer afternoons. A Double Garage is situated at the rear of the property and gives you plenty of room for all the weekend toys.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT IN DESIRABLE DESTINATION!
This low maintenance property in the heart of Cowes is perfect for the savvy investor, an ideal holiday home or permanent residence for the family.
Located only minutes from the beach, local restaurants and cafes, local primary school and all amenities in Cowes this luxury townhouse provides seclusion and privacy. This double story townhouse boasts 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom with magnificent spa bath plus a powder room, 2 livings areas which both lead out onto sunny court yard areas.
The two outdoor entertaining areas complete the Phillip Island experience, allowing you to totally relax after enjoying your day at the beach. Enjoy the private downstairs courtyard and relax whilst the upstairs balcony provides a secluded lounge area to watch the sunset.
Complete with a single lock up garage with plenty of storage, internal access to the courtyard, properties like this don't last long, an inspection today is a must!

SOLID INVESTMENT
This three bedroom, one bathroom treasure is located in a quiet culdesac approximately 1km from the busy Cowes Central and 1km to the beautiful Cowes Bay Beach. A light and bright open kitchen/dining/living room with room to move, makes this property a delight.
All made roads and a driveway gated along the side of the property to access the back yard adds to the convenience.
A Garden shed and established trees complete the picture
A currently tenanted property requires 24 hours notice for inspection.

Description:
MOVE IN READY
This beautifully presented four bedroom, two and a half bathroom and two living zones home, is located in central Cowes.
The Master bedroom is situated at the front of the property with a generous sized walk in robe and double vanity master ensuite.
Moving down the hall you can slip off into the west wing of the property where you will find two further well sized bedrooms with built in robes, separate full bathroom with shower and separate toilet, and the second living space.
This western zone can be closed off from the property and only used when you have guests staying or you are renting out the area.
Moving back into the main corridor of the home we have the fourth bedroom and third toilet/powder room.
The well-appointed kitchen features Caesar stone bench tops, thermo laminated kitchen cupboards and stainless steel appliances.
The property has vinyl board flooring, 19 panel 5Kw solar system, solar hot water with a gas booster and plantation shutters throughout.
There is recycled water to all of the toilets, two car garage and side access to the property perfect for caravan or boat storage.
Other features include
• In garage laundry
• Ceiling fans
• Merbau decking at the front and rear of the property
• 6.2 star energy rating
• Architectural review panel certificate
• Garden shed
• Optic fibre to the house
Inspections are sure to impress, call now to book in an appointment.
Insights: 11 Curlew Way, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

THE PERFECT LIFESTYLE APARTMENT
Situated in the newer section of the Waves apartments this 1st floor north facing apartment is a must inspect.
Perfect for a weekend hideaway or holiday rental it features private sunny balcony overlooking native gardens, generous open plan living/combined bedroom, separate bathroom complete with spa bath and a separate kitchenette with spare accommodation area perfect for the kids or extra guests. Also on offer is a quality walk in walk out furniture package, lift access, off street parking and all only a hop skip and a jump across the road to the beach, park and main street.
Your inspection is warmly invited.

Description:
PERFECTLY POSITIONED WITH POTENTIAL
Sitting proudly on a 599m2 (approx.) flat block, this spacious six bedroom family property is ideally located in a quiet location.
Downstairs features three bedrooms (an oversized master with ensuite and air conditioning), a sizeable family room and additional bathroom with separate toilet.
Upstairs, the light filled generous open plan kitchen/dining/living area (air conditioned) opens on to the wide balcony area which surrounds the front of the home. Three further bedrooms share a third family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry.
The home offers a large rear yard, fenced on three sides with a separate fully fenced area for pets, A huge double garage with high ceilings is perfect for boat or caravan storage and located close to the boat ramp. A low maintenance no fuss garden means you can just cut your lawn and enjoy your weekend away.
Ideally positioned within minutes of Cowes foreshore, north facing beaches and the central business district. This property makes an ideal large family home, a perfect holiday home or rental, short stay accommodation option (this property comes fully furnished) or investment opportunity.

SIZE AND SPACE FOR ALL THE FAMILY

one on each level; and two generous sized living areas opening onto sunny north facing decking.
The block is fully fenced with low maintenance gardens, has plenty of room for parking of boats caravans etc and not forgetting performs very well as a holiday rental.

Description:
OCEAN VIEWS AND WALK TO COWES
Location is everything here with short stroll to Cowes Main Street with shops, restaurants & much more.
This beautiful double story home was built to maximise its prime location and take in water views over Cowes beaches.
Offering 3 bedrooms 2 with built in robes & centrally located bathroom.
The upstairs open plan living/kitchen/dining gives a spacious feel opening onto your balcony great for taking in the northern sun and ocean views.
If you are looking for a Holiday getaway or a permanent home this house ticks all those boxes.

Description:
BIG HOME GREAT VALUE
Located only a short distance from Cowes main street you will find this exceptional brick home set on approximately 606m2 offering 5 spacious bedrooms.
This home offers 2 large living rooms, open plan dining and gourmet kitchen with marble bench tops, custom handmade cabinets and a dual electric and gas cook top.
In addition, all your heating and cooling is covered with split system and all bedrooms are equipped with ceiling fans. Outside pizza oven and alfresco great for entertaining your guests and a spacious back yard to store your boat or kids to play.
This property is designed for low maintenance offering tiles throughout downstairs and carpet on the upper floor. The garden is self-maintaining so all you need to do is cut your lawn and enjoy your weekend away.
Call today to book in your inspection or find out about our next open.

Description:
RENT, RENOVATE OR RELAX
This charming home offers a stylish and modern, low maintenance lifestyle in Cowes only a short stroll to the stunning Red Rocks and Ventnor Beaches.
Featuring three sizeable bedrooms all with robes, a beautiful open plan living area that flows seamlessly through to the large kitchen/dining zone. Complete with a reverse cycle, and wood fire Conara for those cosy winter nights, this family home has it all!
Outside features a entertainers deck and a fantastic sized back yard with a cubby house and plenty of room for the kids to play.
Situated on an 603m2 (approx.) allotment fully fenced, and located in a quiet area perfect for you and the family or an ideal investment opportunity.
This property is sure to impress!
Book your private inspection today.

one on each level; and two generous sized living areas opening onto sunny north facing decking.
The block is fully fenced with low maintenance gardens, has plenty of room for parking of boats caravans etc and not forgetting performs very well as a holiday rental.

Description:
Light filled contemporary beach home
Situated only 300m from the pristine waters of the north facing Cowes beach and a short walk to an enticing selection of local shops, cafe's and restaurants is this brand new single level contemporary beach home.
Built to excellent standards by a trusted local builder, the home is complete - and just waiting for its new owner to add their own personal touch.
The open plan living areas are flooded with natural light from feature windows and from the expansive outdoor decked entertaining area.
A central kitchen is filled with modern luxury, including stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, and glass splash back.
The private master bedroom is serviced by its own ensuite, and walk in robe. There are 2 further bedrooms, both with built in robes.
A unique feature of the home is the luxurious family bathroom / wet room with frameless glass shower panel, free standing bath and floor to ceiling tiles.
Other features include:- Electric entrance gates, single remote garage, outdoor shower, fully fenced low maintenance surrounds, split system heating and cooling and water tank.
The property would be ideal for permanent or holiday living - or as an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

BUILDERS DISPLAY HOME WITH PROMISED RETURN
Here is the unique investment opportunity you have been looking for. This quality built home is located opposite the Whytesands reserve that offers sporting facilities and amenities great for the family.
This premium spec home meets all the needs with 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms large downstairs rumpus room and a spacious open plan kitchen living & dining room.
Offering premium inclusions throughout the home this is one that will tick all the boxes built to take in the northern sun and views of Westernport bay.
This property promises a 6% return on a 2-year leaseback this home is used as a Sales Office for local real estate agency and display home. Enquire now to get a full list of inclusions and lease details.
